archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Special Collections and Archives.

did.abstract: This collection contains archives related to Watergate. Includes manuscripts, correspondence, film, printouts, publications, subject files, and videotapes.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Frank Phillippi Watergate collection must be obtained from Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Frank Phillippi Watergate collection, C0053, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Frank Phillippi in June 1998.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman and Jordan Patty in August 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains archives related to Watergate. Includes manuscripts, correspondence, film, printouts, publications, subject files, and videotapes.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives also holds the .

did.unittitle: An electronic box inventory is unavailable. Please contact speccoll@gmu.edu for more information.
